quiz.question: In what year did Samuel de Champlain found Quebec City, a cornerstone of French North America?
In what year did theist philosopher and statesman Thomas More publish Utopia, influencing political thought?
When did the Great Fire of Rome take place during Nero's reign, a debated historical event?
When was the first recorded use of gunpowder weapons in European warfare at the Battle of Cr√©cy?
What year did the Berlin Conference regulate European colonization of Africa, formalizing the Scramble for Africa?
When did the Great Schism split the Christian Church into Western and Eastern branches?
Which year marks the completion of the Domesday Book, William the Conqueror's survey of England?
In what year was the Treaty of Westphalia signed, ending the Thirty Years' War?
Which year did the Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo end the Mexican-American War, ceding territory to the US?
Which year did the Great Irish Rebellion of 1641 begin, affecting British Isles politics and war?
What year did the Anglo-Powhatan Wars in early colonial Virginia begin, shaping English-Native relations?
Which year did Vasco da Gama reach India by sea, opening a direct Atlantic-Indian route?
In what year did the Irish Free State formally come into existence following the Anglo-Irish Treaty?
When did the Dreyfus Affair begin publicly in France, revealing deep institutional antisemitism and divisions?
In what year was the Code of Justinian compiled, influencing civil law traditions?
